result_list.explanation: Il lui pose sa chaîne sur le cou. — This stage direction describes a character's interaction with an object (a chain).
result_list.stgdir: Il lui pose sa chaîne sur le cou.

result_list.explanation: Durval la lui donne. — This stage direction describes a character giving an object to another character.
Il remet une lettre à Arétaphile. — This stage direction describes a character giving an object (a letter) to another character.
result_list.stgdir: Il remet une lettre à Arétaphile.

result_list.explanation: Il se couvre. — This stage direction describes a general action of the character (covering himself).
Il lui donne la lettre qu'il a trouvée dans le cabinet d'Astrée. — This stage direction describes a character giving an object (a letter) to another character.
result_list.stgdir: Il lui donne la lettre qu'il a trouvée dans le cabinet d'Astrée.

result_list.explanation: Le Ciel se referme. — This stage direction describes a change in the setting (the sky closing).
Il tire un porte-feuille. — This stage direction describes a character interacting with an object (drawing out a wallet).
Elle lui donne son jupon. — This stage direction describes a character giving an object (a skirt) to another character.
Prenant des fleurs dans le tiroir. — This stage direction describes a character interacting with an object (taking flowers from a drawer).
result_list.stgdir: Prenant des fleurs dans le tiroir.

result_list.explanation: Il prend une couronne dans le panier d'Antoine. — This stage direction describes a character interacting with an object (taking a crown from a basket).
result_list.stgdir: Il prend une couronne dans le panier d'Antoine.
